name: linslin/paging-slider
description: pagingSilder brings you Hardware-Accelerated Page Transitions for Web / Mobile Web Apps / PhoneGap Apps. Inspired by http://coenraets.org/blog/2013/03/hardware-accelerated-page-transitions-for-mobile-web-apps-phonegap-apps/ I have written an extension. This extension allows the page slider to control several pages, retrieve individual pages and slide from one side to another.
